original_title: The Legendary Pink Dots: A Dream Is A Dream Is A Dream
overview: Recorded live at De Vrije Vloer in Utrecht, Holland on 21 January 1987 featuring the original 6 piece line up.  1 	Dream Intro / Curious Guy  2 	The Plasma Twins  3 	Premonition 16 / She Said  4 	The Hill  5 	Echo Police  6 	Rattlesnake Arena  7 	Poppy Day  8 	The Jewel In The Crown  9 	Our Lady In Chambers  10 	Guardians Of Eden  11 	The Dairy  12 	Neon Gladiators  13 	Love Puppets  14 	The Heretic  15 	I Am The Way, The Truth, The Light  16 	Silverture / Flowers For The Silverman
title: The Legendary Pink Dots: A Dream Is A Dream Is A Dream
